node.banner: 2.139 was not properly released, so only the corresponding Git commits exist.

changes.message: Allow use of the <tt>console</tt> command with Job/Read permission.
Upgrade libpam4j from 1.8 to 1.11.
CLI command enable-plugin -restart will no longer restart Jenkins if no plugins were actually enabled.
Nested f:repeatable/f:repeatableProperty form elements inherited minimum when they shouldn't.
Build logs were not displayed correctly when they contained hyperlinks whose link text contains newline characters.
Developer: Add support for the @PostConstruct lifecycle method annotation.
Developer: Add interface PersistentDescriptor that allows implementing Descriptors to skip explicit calls to load().

changes.pr_title: [JENKINS-72159] deactivate MarkedOffline monitor when agents are online
changes.message: Deactivate the administrative monitor when all previously offline agents are again online.

changes.pr_title: [JENKINS-64816] prepare for support of node monitors by JCasC
changes.message: Prepare node monitors to work with configuration as code.

changes.pr_title: [JENKINS-71715] Allow plugins with alternate build log visualizations to handle console links from core and other plugins
changes.message: Introduce an API for build visualization plugins to serve alternative build console views and an API for plugins to produce links to the build console.

node.banner: The Windows container images of this release switch from a windowsservercore-1809 Temurin base image to a windowsservercore-ltsc2019 Microsoft base image. Note also that a proper set of tags is now published and they include "ltsc2019" instead of only "2019".

changes.pr_title: Stop recommending `-jnlpUrl`
changes.message: Stop recommending JNLP URL in agent launch instructions.

changes.pr_title: Deleted long deprecated and unused `UserProperties`
changes.message: Removed deprecated and unused class UserProperties.

changes.pr_title: Temporary memory leak in `FutureImpl.executors`
changes.message: Some agent-related objects could be kept in memory after being disconnected and removed from the computer list.

node.banner: The Windows container image of this release is using Java 17 by default like the Linux images.

changes.pr_title: [JENKINS-60866][JENKINS-71797] Remove timeline widget
changes.message: Remove build timeline widget from the build history pages of views, jobs, and agents.

changes.pr_title: Log `Error`s from `SlaveComputer._connect`
changes.message: More consistently report errors launching outbound agents.

changes.pr_title: [JENKINS-72252] Warn 12 months and 3 months before end of Java support
changes.message: Warn users at 12 months prior to end of Java support and again at 3 months prior to end of Java support.

changes.pr_title: [JENKINS-72266] Upgrade Winstone from 6.14 to 6.16 (upgrade Jetty from 10.0.17 to 10.0.18
changes.message:
Add support for Unix Domain Sockets.
Upgrade Jetty from 10.0.17 to 10.0.18.

changes.pr_title: [JENKINS-72189] fix drag&drop handle for existing repeatables
changes.message: Fix drag and drop handles for existing repeatables (regression in 2.335).

changes.pr_title: [JENKINS-72222] Fix inconsistent wording between login page and security configuration
changes.message: Refer to the correct option in the security configuration help text.

changes.pr_title: Fix issues with help texts under security configuration
changes.message: Restore security configuration help text and remove obsolete help text.

changes.pr_title: Turkish localization fixes for build page
changes.message: Turkish localization fixes for build, login, and user management pages.

changes.pr_title: Bump org.jenkins-ci.main:remoting from 3181.v78543a_987053 to 3186.vc3b_7249b_87eb_
changes.message:
Fix a minor memory leak in a Remoting log statement.
Add forward proxy support for WebSocket.
Support custom certificate options for WebSocket.

changes.pr_title: [JEP-237] Do not support shortening of HMAC code on FIPS mode
changes.message: Prevent trimming HMAC codes (using HAMCConfidentialKey) when running in FIPS mode only.

changes.pr_title: [JENKINS-72181] Restore flushed output for 'groovy' CLI command
changes.message: Restore printing output from println and similar methods for the groovy CLI command (regression in 2.427).

changes.pr_title: [JENKINS-72179] Show description of boolean build parameter values
changes.message: Show the description of boolean build parameter values on the Parameters view (regression in 2.179).
Important security fix.

changes.pr_title: [JENKINS-72148] Add missing fr properties in hudson directory
changes.message: Add missing *_fr.properties in win32errors and hudson, lib, and Jenkins resources. Translate hudson/Messages.properties, hudson/model/Messages.properties, and jenkins/model/Messages.properties into French.

changes.pr_title: Add telemetry for Jenkins uptime
changes.message: Add telemetry for Jenkins uptime.

changes.pr_title: [JENKINS-72156] Upgrade to Winstone 6.14 which contains an upgrade to Jetty 10.0.17
changes.message:
Upgrade Winstone from 6.12 to 6.14.
This includes the upgrade of Jetty from 10.0.15 to 10.0.17.
The Jetty upgrade includes fixes for several CVEs.

changes.pr_title: [JENKINS-72170] fix nested hetero-list entries with mixture of inputs and buttons
changes.message: Fix multibranch Pipeline Add source and other uses that mix inputs and buttons (regression in 2.422).

changes.pr_title: [JENKINS-72020] Restore ability to reorder clouds
changes.message:
Allow clouds to be reordered.
This was previously possible, but disappeared when the cloud management was moved to a separate page (regression in 2.403).

changes.pr_title: [JENKINS-72107] Introduce `Loadable` interface
changes.message: Developer: Formalize an interface for objects that can be loaded from disk.

changes.pr_title: [JENKINS-72111] Allow `Lifecycle` to load implementations from plugins
changes.message: Developer: Allow plugins to define a custom Lifecycle.

changes.pr_title: [JENKINS-71937] Fix deprecated `Slave` constructor
changes.message: Fix agent allocation due to label issue detected by vSphere Cloud plugin (regression in 2.421).

changes.pr_title: [JENKINS-71252][JENKINS-70793] Multiple form validation fixes
changes.message: Show form validation results for form elements that are initially hidden. (regression in 2.355).

changes.pr_title: [JENKINS-71252][JENKINS-70793] Multiple form validation fixes
changes.message: Remove previous form validation errors when the form validation is updated with new content. (regression in 2.355).

changes.pr_title: [JEP-237] Disable usage stats in fips mode
changes.message: Disable anonymous usage statistics when run in FIPS mode.

changes.pr_title: [JENKINS-72114] Fix serialization of `HudsonPrivateSecurityRealm.UserDetailsImpl`
changes.message: Developer: HudsonPrivateSecurityRealm objects are now serializable.

changes.pr_title: [JENKINS-41516] Add script console listener
changes.message: Developer: Add extension point to notify about in-process scripting events.

changes.pr_title: [JENKINS-71971][JEP-237] FIPS-140 compliant version of HudsonPrivateSecurityRealm
changes.message: Developer: Optionally support a FIPS140 compliant algorithm in the Jenkins' own user database.

changes.pr_title: [JENKINS-70906] Remove prototype from core
changes.message: Remove outdated Prototype.js library.

changes.pr_title: Java 17 by default
changes.message: Use Java 17 as the default Java version in container images that do not specify a Java version in the container label.

changes.pr_title: Automate Java version recommendation administrative monitor
changes.message: Automate the display of an administrative monitor when approaching Java end of life (EOL) dates.

changes.pr_title: Avoid saving disabled status when deleting a project
changes.message: Optimized project deletion.

changes.pr_title: Remove KXML2 library
changes.message: Stop shipping net.sf.kxml:kxml2 because Jenkins no longer depends on it.

changes.pr_title: [JENKINS-72067] High memory usage from `XStream2.AssociatedConverterImpl`
changes.message: Reduce high memory usage from XStream2.AssociatedConverterImpl (regression in 2.405).

changes.pr_title: Add data-bound setters for View
changes.message: Developer: Added setters for View#filterExecutor and View#filterQueue. Fix missing help sections for view filter executor and queue fields.

changes.pr_title: [JEP-237] introduce FIPS property
changes.message: Developer: introduce FIPS property for JEP-237

changes.pr_title: [JENKINS-71866] Allow to use alternate values for "Build with Parameters" and the "Build" button on the parameters page
changes.message: Allow alternate values for "Build with Parameters" and the "Build" button on the parameters page.

changes.pr_title: Optimization for `AbstractLazyLoadRunMap.loadNumberOnDisk`
changes.message: Small speculative optimization in build loading.

changes.pr_title: Increase minimum required Remoting version from 4.7 to 4.13
changes.message: The minimum required Remoting version has been increased to 4.13 (released on March 4, 2022).

changes.pr_title: fix signup autofocus
changes.message: Prevent log spam when using the Jenkins security database and users signup.

changes.pr_title: [JENKINS-71880] fix notification in breadcrumb
changes.message: Show a confirmation popup when triggering l:task action from context menu.

changes.pr_title: [JENKINS-71890] Model links in build history views and administrative monitors no longer work
changes.message: Restore context menus of model links in build history views and in administrative monitors. (regression in 2.402).

changes.pr_title: [JENKINS-72018] Form entries in .repeated-chunk using .show-if-not-only CSS class are not hidden when they are alone
changes.message: Hide the delete button from the only repeatable element in configuration forms when at least one element is expected (regression in 2.344).

changes.pr_title: [JENKINS-72016] Define a thread pool for `ProxyConfiguration`â€™s `HttpClient`
changes.message: Do not create a large number of threads when making numerous HTTP requests.

changes.pr_title: LogRecorder programmatic deletion support
changes.message: Developer: Provide programmatic deletion support for LogRecorder.
Important security fixes.

changes.pr_title: Move Node monitoring option to app bar
changes.message: Move node monitoring option to app bar.

changes.pr_title: [JENKINS-71983] allow symbols in MenuItem#withIconClass
changes.message: Symbols display in breadcrumbs now.

changes.pr_title: Make branding overridable in signin/login page
changes.message: Developer: make branding an extension via SimplePageDecorator.

changes.pr_title: Label parsing robustness fix
changes.message: Prevent incorrect readResolve implementations from breaking agent label parsing.

changes.pr_title: Replace hetero-list YUI button and menu with new style button and tippy.js menu
changes.message: Update several buttons and menus to replace YahooUI in more locations.

changes.pr_title: [JENKINS-71950] List plugins in deterministic order
changes.message: List plugins in deterministic order to improve diagnosability of plugin linkage errors.

changes.pr_title: Add telemetry for security-related settings
changes.message: Add telemetry collecting basic information about the security configuration.

changes.pr_title: Turkish localization fixes for the new job page
changes.message: Update Turkish localization for the new job page.

changes.pr_title: Upgrade to winstone 6.13 which upgrades to Jetty 10.0.16
changes.message: Upgrade to Winstone 6.13 to include Jetty 10.0.16.

changes.pr_title: Initialize default view earlier in the init process.
changes.message: Developer: Initialize default view slightly earlier in the initialization process.

changes.pr_title: [JENKINS-71087] Nicer 404 error pages
changes.message: Add a nicer 404 error page.

changes.pr_title: Add `Appearance` system configuration page
changes.message: Add appearance system configuration page.

changes.pr_title: Optimize Label parsing calls
changes.message: Optimize performance of label parsing.

changes.pr_title: [JENKINS-71479] Do not use SCSS lighten function directly to avoid invalid CSS
changes.message: Fix invalid CSS which caused some buttons to become invisible on hover.

changes.pr_title: [JENKINS-38520] Every message in agent log appears twice with the `-agentLog` option
changes.message: Message no longer appears twice when the agentLog option is used.

changes.pr_title: Move app bar for plugins
changes.message: Move plugins page title into sidebar so that plugins app bar is at the top of the page.

changes.pr_title: [JENKINS-71514] Remove `eval` call in hudson-behavior.js
changes.message: Remove eval call in hudsonbehavior.js.

changes.pr_title: Turkish localization fixes for the job configuration page
changes.message: Update Turkish localizations for the job configuration page.

changes.pr_title: Update link design
changes.message: Refresh link design.

changes.pr_title: Display a notice when there are plugins installed or updates available
changes.message: Display a notice when plugin updates are available or when there are no plugins installed.

changes.pr_title: Update the design of the content blocks
changes.message: Update the design of the content blocks.

changes.pr_title: Remove the addition of the 'has-help' class from `hudson-behaviour.js`
changes.message: Remove the unnecessary hashelp class additions from hudsonbehaviour.js.

changes.pr_title: [JENKINS-71848] Remove admin monitors popup from `/manage/` again
changes.message: Hide administrative monitors icons/popup in the header of Manage Jenkins, as they're shown directly on the page.

changes.pr_title: [JENKINS-61452] Tolerate corrupt Base64 in `PlainTextConsoleOutputStream`
changes.message: The plain text console log will still be printed even if some console annotations are corrupt.

changes.pr_title: [JENKINS-71833] Fix link to job in slow trigger admin monitor
changes.message: Fix link to job in the message informing administrators of trigger computations that run for an unusually long time.

changes.pr_title: Deprecate `findAncestor` and `findAncestorClass`
changes.message: Deprecate findAncestor and findAncestorClass in hudsonbehaviour.js.

changes.pr_title: Remove the addition of the 'has-help' class from hudson-behaviour.js
changes.message: Remove the addition of the 'has-help' class from hudson-behaviour.js.

changes.pr_title: Display a notice when there are plugins installed or updates available
changes.message: Display a notice when there are plugins installed or updates available.

changes.pr_title: Update the design of the content blocks
changes.message: Update the design of the content blocks.

changes.pr_title: Use standard size node icon even with long node names
changes.message: Use standard size node icon even with long node names.

changes.pr_title: Deprecate findAncestor and findAncestorClass
changes.message: Deprecate findAncestor and findAncestorClass in hudson-behaviour.js.

changes.pr_title: [JENKINS-71238] New login page breaks `login-theme-plugin`
changes.message: New login page breaks login theme plugin.

changes.pr_title: [JENKINS-71744] Fix context menu
changes.message: Fix "Manage Jenkins" context menu (regression in 2.415).

changes.pr_title: Fix mistranslation of  noPrincipal_ja.properties
changes.message: Fix mistranslation of Japanese message in mailing list reference.

changes.pr_title: Simpler `Jenkins.getComputers`
changes.message: Small optimization in computer list.

changes.pr_title: [JENKINS-71054] Remove the treeview option for artifactList
changes.message: Remove the treeview option for artifactList.

changes.pr_title: Remove `java.desktop/com.sun.beans.introspect` from `Add-Opens`
changes.message: Remove a workaround that was only necessary for OpenJDK 11.0.16 and earlier.

changes.pr_title: Move 'expandableTextbox' to a jenkins-button
changes.message: Use new jenkins-button styling for 'expandableTextbox' button.

changes.pr_title: Add logging for agent usage by job
changes.message: Log agent usage by job.

changes.pr_title: [JENKINS-71496] Make tab pane selection reachable via keyboard
changes.message: Make tab panes accessible via keyboard.

changes.pr_title: RPM: Remove System V initialization script
changes.message: Remove System V initialization scripts from RPM based installers. The System V initialization scripts were replaced in March 2022 with systemd initialization. RPM users with a custom log directory no longer have a logrotate(8) configuration out-of-the-box.

references.title: Linux install packages migrated from System V init to systemd

changes.pr_title: [JENKINS-71366] Set sandbox allow-same-origin in DEFAULT_CSP_VALUE.
changes.message: Add allow-same-origin to the sandbox ContentSecurityPolicy directive of workspace and artifact browsers if the Resource Root URL feature is not used. Allow requests to resources like stylesheets and images, even if a reverse proxy prohibits cross-site requests.

changes.pr_title: [JENKINS-71186] - Avoid a warning from web application scanners
changes.message: Add the X-Content-Type-Options HTTP header to the response from the agent listener. Silence security scanners that incorrectly report an issue when the HTTP header is missing.

changes.pr_title: [JENKINS-71698] Only disable plugin manager button if none are selected
changes.message: Only disable the plugin manager "install" button if no plugins are selected (regression in 2.414).
Important security fix.

changes.pr_title: [JENKINS-71438] Replace browser confirm with modal dialogs
changes.message: Replace browser confirm with modal dialogs in many places.

changes.pr_title: Add last build status to job page
changes.message: Add last build status to job page.

changes.pr_title: Remove Rebuilder Plugin from setup wizard options
changes.message: Remove the rebuild plugin from the setup wizard plugin selection.

changes.pr_title: `LazyBuildMixIn.getEstimatedDurationCandidates` duplication
changes.message: Estimate project duration accurately in more cases (regression in 2.407).

changes.pr_title: [JENKINS-71438] Replace browser confirm with modal dialogs
changes.message: Developer: API for alert, confirm, prompt, modal and form dialogs

changes.pr_title: Remove deprecated `DIR_SEPARATOR` and `LINE_SEPARATOR`
changes.message: Remove long deprecated hudson.util.IOUtils#DIR_SEPARATOR, hudson.util.IOUtils#DIR_SEPARATOR_WINDOWS, hudson.util.IOUtils#DIR_SEPARATOR_UNIX, hudson.util.IOUtils#LINE_SEPARATOR, hudson.util.IOUtils#LINE_SEPARATOR_WINDOWS, and hudson.util.IOUtils#LINE_SEPARATOR_UNIX which are available from org.apache.commons.io.IOUtils.

changes.pr_title: [JENKINS-70059] Improve Safe Restart interface and user information
changes.message:
Allow cancelling the quiet down mode of a safe restart with an optional custom message for safe restarts (with new default message).
Use a less dangerous color for the safeRestart banner.
Allow setting the full prepareShutdown message instead of only the reason.
Show a hint on the "Jenkins Unavailable" page about safe restarts.

changes.pr_title: Move the 'Update' and 'Install' buttons to the app bar
changes.message: Move the 'Update' and 'Install' buttons to the app bar.

changes.pr_title: [JENKINS-71034] [JENKINS-71035] [JENKINS-71036] [JENKINS-71037] Improve CSP compatibility
changes.message: Improve CSP compatibility by uninlining javascript code.

changes.pr_title: Update legacyapitoken revoke button style matching 'jenkins-button's
changes.message: Make the style of the legacy API token revoke button consistent with other buttons.

changes.pr_title: Update appearance of buttons for password and secretTextarea matching 'jenkins-button's
changes.message: Update appearance of buttons for password and secretTextarea matching 'jenkins-button's.

changes.pr_title: Display a notice when there are no logs available
changes.message: Display a notice in the log manager page when no logs are available.

changes.pr_title: [JENKINS-71553] Add history widget factory for job not implementing `Queue.Task`
changes.message: Restore missing build history for external jobs (regression in 2.409).

changes.pr_title: [JENKINS-71042] [JENKINS-71044] [JENKINS-71045] Improve CSP compatibility
changes.message: Improve CSP compatibility.

changes.pr_title: Upgrade Winstone from 6.11 to 6.12
changes.message: Add or update MIME types for JavaScript files, JavaScript module files, AV1 Image File (AVIF) files, Web Open Font Format (WOFF) files, and WebAssembly files.

changes.pr_title: [JENKINS-71040] [JENKINS-71041] Improve CSP compatibility
changes.message: Improve CSP compatibility by removing inline JS event handlers.

changes.pr_title: Use CSS variables for logger colours
changes.message: Use CSS variables for logger colours.

changes.pr_title: Update the Log Recorders interface
changes.message: Update the Log Recorders interface.

changes.pr_title: Add Japanese translation of Apply
changes.message: Add Japanese translation of Apply.

changes.pr_title: Clean up `DoubleLaunchChecker`
changes.message: Switch the doublelaunch checker to a regular administrative monitor.

changes.pr_title: JENKINS-71246 Remove animations on login page causing high CPU usage in some cases
changes.message: Remove animations on login page causing high CPU usage in some cases.

changes.pr_title: Improve sign in/register screens appearance on mobile
changes.message: Improve sign in/register screens appearance on mobile.

changes.pr_title: [JENKINS-71429] Fix deleting users via trashcan symbol
changes.message: Allow user deletion from the trash can icon (regression in 2.405).

changes.pr_title: [JENKINS-71383] Confluence Publisher plugin space check not working (regression in 2.406)
changes.message: Fix a bug when searching for matching form elements (regression in 2.406).

changes.pr_title: Make widgets really pluggable
changes.message: Developer: plugins can now contribute widgets for Computer, ComputerSet, View, Job.

node.banner: Jenkins 2.408 was not packaged or delivered. All changes planned for 2.408 are included in 2.409.

changes.message: Jenkins 2.408 was not placed in the artifact repository or on the download site.

changes.pr_title: Use jenkins-button for Repeatable buttons
changes.message: Use jenkins-button for repeatable buttons.

changes.pr_title: [JENKINS-71394] Fedora 38 should not show EOL warning until 2024
changes.message: Do not show Fedora 38 as an end of life operating system before actual end of life in 2024.

changes.pr_title: Don't show arrow next to restart checkbox if OS doesn't support it
changes.message: Hide the arrow next to the restart checkbox if the environment doesn't support it.

changes.pr_title: [JENKINS-71244] Avoid relative link in update center
changes.message: Use correct update center proxy configuration hyperlink in error messages.

changes.pr_title: Move from `javax.inject` to `jakarta.inject`
changes.message: Add support for jakarta.inject annotations.

changes.pr_title: Warn when operating system end of life is approaching
changes.message: Warn administrators when their Linux operating system is approaching end of life.

changes.pr_title: Warn when operating system end of life is approaching
changes.message: Announce early end of life for Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7 and its derivatives (like CentOS Linux 7, Scientific Linux 7, and Oracle Linux 7).

changes.pr_title: Minor footer appearance tweaks
changes.message: Minor footer appearance tweaks.

changes.pr_title: Lazy-load-friendly `Job.getEstimatedDurationCandidates`
changes.message: Reduce the circumstances under which recent old builds will be loaded when starting new builds.

changes.pr_title: Make Cloud#reconfigure public as it is necessary for downstream implementations
changes.message: Developer: Make Cloud#reconfigure method public.

changes.pr_title: Replace disconnect and system info symbols for agents
changes.message: Replace disconnect and system info symbols for agents.

changes.pr_title: [JENKINS-71200] Fix elements property overload in ListView
changes.message: Prefix the name of input elements of ListView to prevent form submission issues when an Item (job) is named elements.

changes.pr_title: Unrestrict `UserSeedChangeListener`
changes.message: Developer: Expose UserSeedChangeListener extension point.

changes.pr_title: `AbstractItem#doReload` should not be calling `SaveableListener#fireOnChange`
changes.message: Developer: do not call SaveableListener.fireOnChange anymore when reloading an AbstractItem.

changes.pr_title: Deprecate `Form.findMatchingInput` Prototype extension in favor of a new non-Prototype replacement
changes.message: Developer: Support searches for matching form elements without the use of the Prototype JavaScript framework.

changes.pr_title: Introduced utility `HttpServletFilter`
changes.message: Developer: Added a utility HttpServletFilter to the API.

changes.pr_title: Adjust form label padding
changes.message: Adjust form label padding.

changes.pr_title: [JENKINS-13545] use dialogs to delete computers, views, clouds, users and logrecorders
changes.message: Use dialogs to delete computers, views, clouds, users and logrecorders.

changes.pr_title: Refinements to `AssociatedConverterImpl.cache`
changes.message: Improve class loading behavior looking up special formatters for XML configuration files.

changes.pr_title: Upgrade from Guice 5.1.0 to 6.0.0
changes.message: Upgrade from Guice 5 to 6.

changes.pr_title: [JENKINS-71236] Stapler Ajax proxy is broken
changes.message: Restore support for ECharts API plugin (regression in 2.404).

changes.pr_title: Make the skip link visible
changes.message: Make "Skip to content" link visible through keyboard navigation.

changes.pr_title: Support clouds without a `config.jelly`
changes.message: Fix support of clouds without a config.jelly file.

changes.pr_title: Introduce `jenkins.model.queue.QueueItem` interface
changes.message: Developer: Queue items elements are now formalized using jenkins.model.queue.QueueItem.
